title: Psycho-Pass Movie (Psycho-Pass: The Movie)
synopsis: Due to the incredible success of the Sibyl System, Japan has begun exporting the technology to other countries with the hope that it will one day be used all around the world. In order to test its effectiveness in a foreign location, the war-torn state of the South East Asian Union (SEAUn) decides to implement the system, hoping to bring peace and stability to the town of Shambala Float and keep the population in check.
related_anime: ['Psycho-Pass 2', 'Psycho-Pass: Sinners of the System Case.1 - Tsumi to Batsu']
